Description: Filter identifier following the naming convention
Unique identifier for the filter (UUID format)
Whether the filter is active and should be applied
Type of filter: 'pre-filter' (before processing) or 'post-filter' (after processing)
Filter expression to evaluate against events

Example: Default filter to allow all events
Description: Description of the filter's purpose and functionality
Name of the filter author or organization
URL reference for the author or organization
Date when the filter was created
